tasks.task: Take a deep breath and carefully examine the PDF page image.
Scan the entire page and identify all content present - text, images, tables, diagrams, charts, handwriting, or any other elements.

Write a complete description of what you see on the page: Describe each type of content present Note where different content appears (top, bottom, left, right, margins) Be specific about what the content actually is (not just "a table" but "a table showing quarterly sales figures") Mention any notable characteristics or details
Assess the image quality and note any issues that might affect analysis.

Determine if image enhancement would improve analysis: Look for signs of degradation: yellowing, fading, noise, low contrast Check for handwritten content, annotations, or historical manuscripts If enhancement would help, set enhancement_recommended to true and provide a reason Clean modern documents with clear text do NOT need enhancement
Format your response according to the JSON structure in .
Review your description to ensure it gives a complete picture of the page content.
